para.text: Acknowledgements
Thank you!
Guineu wouldn't have been possible without the help and support of numerous people. Special thanks go to:
My wife Christina Wollenhaupt who didn't believe me when I explained that this project will make me famous and incredible rich, but supported me nevertheless and was correct in the end.
Visual FoxPro® MVP Frédéric Steczycki who volunteered to implement some of Guineu's features in C#.
Peter Steinke who also implemented some functions in C#.
Jürgen Wondzinski and Bob Pierce for giving presentations on Guineu.
Thomas Kahl for registering the domain.
Andrew MacNeill who did a
on Guineu.
Everyone who reported a bug: Bernard Bout, Russell Campbell, Jonathan Clark, Christoph Dreßler
, Garrett Fitzgerald, Thomas Francl,
Bernhard Herlemann, Peter Herzog, Thomas Kammerer, Nicola Marangon, Joan Mir, James Monte, Robert Pierce
, Gaetano Quatrocchi, Carlos Serna,
Александр Третьяков. And to everyone who helped with Guineu by spreading the word (especially Peter Kuster), supporting me in development, or making suggestions.
Frank Camp for his research on the SYS(2015) format.
The guys from
for their free Smart Device Framework.
Erik Bachmann and David Kuechler for
on FoxPro file formats.
John Opincar for his
on using ITypedList.
